TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NullableBoolConverter extends System.ComponentModel.NullableConverter

Docs.summary: Converts to and from the type (using the type constraint on the generic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Nullable\ type is used for selection state in certain controls. This converter enables that non-set attribute values do not mean either `true` or `false` but instead mean an unset state. ## XAML Text Usage

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: Provides contextual information about a component, such as its container and property descriptor.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type that this type converter is designed for.
Docs.returns: A collection that holds a standard set of valid values. For this implementation, those values are , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `context` is not used by this converter and can be `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: Provides contextual information about a component, such as its container and property descriptor.
Docs.summary: Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from is an exclusive list.

Docs.summary: Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
